title: Ru Yi
overview: Ordinary girl Ye Ruyi suddenly finds herself transported into a comic book, only to become a minor side character doomed to fail. Meanwhile, the antagonist Zuo Qianchen inexplicably awakens to self-awareness within the comic's world. From initial mutual suspicion to eventually joining forces to defy their predestined fates, they fight through the obstacles of the comic's rigid storyline, breaking free from its constraints. Through hardship, they find redemption in each other, and the blossoms of friendship and love bloom brightly as they rewrite their destinies together.
